# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (Position: x=41.0 y=-82.0)
- Stone furnace (Position: x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (Position: x=39.5 y=-79.5)
- Burner inserter (Position: x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Copper cable factory at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (Position: x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (Position: x=106.5 y=-32.5)
- Boiler (Position: x=111.5 y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (Position: x=117.5 y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (Position: x=107.5 y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (Position: x=105.5 y=-32.5)
- Electricity group (Position: x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668)

### Transport system at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Belt group (Position: x=40.5 y=-83.5)
- Transport belt (Position: x=63.5 y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (Position: x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using entities without fuel
- Ensure that entities such as burner mining drills and boilers have fuel before using them.
### Errors when using entities without ingredients
- Ensure that entities such as stone furnaces have the necessary ingredients before using them.
### Errors when using entities without connection to electric network
- Ensure that entities such as steam engines are connected to the electric network before using them.
### Errors when using entities without proper setup
- Ensure that entities such as pipe groups and belt groups are properly set up before using them.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined or invoked. 
Important variables that have been assigned:
- Entity positions (e.g. x=41.0 y=-82.0)
- Entity statuses (e.g. EntityStatus.NO_FUEL)
- Entity types (e.g. burner-mining-drill, stone-furnace)
